Package ij.macro

Interface Summary
MacroConstants  
MacroExtension  
 

Class Summary
ExtensionDescriptor  
FunctionFinder This class implements the text editor's Macros/Find Functions command.
Functions This class implements the built-in macro functions.
Interpreter This is the recursive descent parser/interpreter for the ImageJ macro language.
MacroRunner This class runs macros in a separate thread.
Program An object of this type is a tokenized macro file and the associated symbol table.
Symbol Objects of this class are used as entries in the macro language symbol table.
Tokenizer This class converts an imageJ macro file file into a token stream.
